FAQs.response: You can return items within 30 days of purchase provided they are in their original condition.

FAQs.query: How do I update my billing information?
FAQs.response: You can update your billing details from your account settings under the 'Billing' section. If you encounter any issues, please contact support.

FAQs.query: Where can I view my order history?
FAQs.response: Your order history is available in your account dashboard under the 'Orders' tab.

FAQs.query: Do you offer any warranty on your products?
FAQs.response: Yes, all our products come with a one-year warranty. Extended warranty options are also available for select items.

FAQs.query: How can I contact customer support?
FAQs.response: You can contact our customer support via email, phone, or live chat on our website.

FAQs.query: Where can I find troubleshooting guides?
FAQs.response: Troubleshooting guides are available in the 'Help' section on our website. Simply search by product or issue to find the relevant guide.
We offer standard, expedited, and overnight shipping options. Shipping charges vary based on your location and chosen shipping speed.
Orders can be canceled within one hour of placement. After that, cancellation may not be possible, but please contact our support team for assistance.

FAQs.query: How do I track my shipment?
FAQs.response: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email. Use that number on the carrier's website to track your shipment.

FAQs.query: Do you have a loyalty program?
FAQs.response: Yes, we offer a loyalty program that rewards frequent customers with discounts and exclusive offers. Sign up through your account dashboard.
